医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型液体活检技术利用RNA“暗物质”检测癌症癌症在早期阶段是最容易治疗的，因此寻找创新和非侵入性的方法来早期诊断癌症对于对抗这种疾病至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-liquid-biopsy-technology-uses-RNA-dark-matter-to-detect-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/New-liquid-biopsy-technology-uses-RNA-dark-matter-to-detect-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9b34637-e9ea-46dc-9509-9feb6b48dd48 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 14:08:50 -0400 New liquid biopsy technology uses RNA "dark matter" to detect cancer
研究发现急救人员的非人化与倦怠之间存在联系从奋战在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行前线的医疗专业人员到营救毛伊岛野火受害者的消防员，急救人员常常被誉为英雄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-link- Between-dehumanization-and-burnout-in-first-responders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-link- Between-dehumanization-and-burnout-in-first-responders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=047ae1d8-5dca-4c12-b6cf-aaf260f0b7ae Thu, 31 Aug 2023 13:52:31 -0400 Study finds link between dehumanization and burnout in first responders
科学家发现新的小胶质细胞群对记忆和学习很重要经过七年多的研究，塞维利亚大学 IBiS（塞维利亚生物医学研究所）的研究人员发现了一种新的关键细胞类型，在记忆和学习的发育过程中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Scientists-discover-new-microglial-population-important-for-memory-and-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Scientists-discover-new-microglial-population-important-for-memory-and-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510ea63d-37bb-4592-a979-4cf209fe1241 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 13:29:00 -0400 Scientists discover new microglial population important for memory and learning
研究发现索马鲁肽可为肥胖表型心力衰竭和 HFpEF 患者带来益处研究人员评估了索马鲁肽对心力衰竭肥胖表型和射血分数保留的患者的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-semaglutide-provides-benefits-for-病人-with-obesity-phenotype-of-heart-failure-and-HFpEF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-finds-semaglutide-provides-benefits-for-病人-with-obesity-phenotype-of-heart-failure-and-HFpEF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eee60a30-49f8-4517-9627-8139a56c0b5d Thu, 31 Aug 2023 13:20:00 -0400 Study finds semaglutide provides benefits for patients with obesity phenotype of heart failure and HFpEF
变形球利用触觉反馈帮助人们管理心理健康英国巴斯大学的一名博士生发明了一种软球，它可以“拟人化”呼吸，与人的吸气和呼气同步扩张和收缩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Shape-shifting-ball-uses-haptic-feedback-to-help-people-manage-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Shape-shifting-ball-uses-haptic-feedback-to-help-people-manage-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ce52cba-dc2d-4bf1-a2cf-424b36785226 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 13:06:36 -0400 Shape-shifting ball uses haptic feedback to help people manage mental health
母亲的高脂肪饮食可能会改变后代的气道神经，导致哮喘新的研究指出了怀孕期间高脂肪饮食和后代哮喘背后的一种新的潜在机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Maternal-high-fat-diet-may-alter-airway-nerves-in-offspring-leading-to-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Maternal-high-fat-diet-may-alter-airway-nerves-in-offspring-leading-to-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e38c1560-0869-4ad2-a8ec-8df22d9703d0 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 12:57:26 -0400 Maternal high-fat diet may alter airway nerves in offspring, leading to asthma
研究发现加拿大大西洋地区高收入人群患黑色素瘤的风险增加麦吉尔大学领导的一项新研究调查了为什么生活在大西洋地区的人比其他加拿大人更容易患黑色素瘤，为全国预防皮肤癌提供了经验教训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Higher-Income-Individuals-at-Increased-Risk-of-Melanoma-in-Atlantic-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Higher-Income-Individuals-at-Increased-Risk-of-Melanoma-in-Atlantic-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebf3acf2-86da-4f3f-8f75-2c335bb9ce82 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 12:43:00 -0400 Higher-income individuals at increased risk of melanoma in Atlantic Canada, study finds
研究表明脓毒症对公共卫生造成相当大的负担瑞典隆德大学的一个研究小组发现，瑞典南部所有住院患者中，有超过 4% 与败血症有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-suggests-sepsis-as-a-considerable-burden-to-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-suggests-sepsis-as-a-considerable-burden-to-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9858701-fbc2-4f60-8697-b02cfc8bcd74 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 12:21:56 -0400 Study suggests sepsis as a considerable burden to public health
运动也可以对心理健康产生重大影响锻炼可能绝对是可怕的。然而，就健康益处而言，我们的任何借口都无关紧要。锻炼的好处不仅限于身体健康，还对心理健康产生重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Exercise-can-also-have-a-major-impact-on-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Exercise-can-also-have-a-major-impact-on-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e852c1c-8508-419e-8141-de9e0b633c96 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 12:13:38 -0400 Exercise can also have a major impact on mental health
Henry Ford Health 旗下所有五家急症护理医院均获得 NAPBC 认证Henry Ford Health 旗下所有五家急症护理医院均获得了国家乳腺中心认证计划 (NAPBC) 的为期三年的重新认证，该计划是由美国外科医生学会管理的一项质量计划。随着底特律亨利福特医院、亨利福特杰克逊医院、亨利福特马科姆医院、亨利福特西布卢姆菲尔德医院和亨利福特怀恩多特医院获得全面重新认证，亨利福特拥有美国所有医疗系统中癌症委员会和 NAPBC 认证医院数量最多的医院。密歇根州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/All- Five-of-Henry-Ford-Healths-acute-care-hospitals-earn-NAPBC-accreditation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/All- Five-of-Henry-Ford-Healths-acute-care-hospitals-earn-NAPBC-accreditation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43328a59-eb8c-48ec-b416-8262ca05efa0 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 12:09:44 -0400 All five of Henry Ford Health's acute care hospitals earn NAPBC accreditation
